topic.title: Additional Vital Signs Organizer - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.30"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

MAY contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Stroke Score (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.163)

MAY contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pain Score (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.164)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Level Of Responsiveness (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.165)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Blood Glucose (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.166)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Carbon Monoxide (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.167)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Carbon Dioxide (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.168)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Cardiac Rhythm (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.169)

SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Glasgow Coma Score Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.170)
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type x_ActClassDocumentEntryOrganizer
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
Contains exactly one [1..1] statusCode with data type CS

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

MAY contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Stroke Score (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.163)

MAY contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Pain Score (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.164)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Level Of Responsiveness (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.165)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Blood Glucose (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.166)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Carbon Monoxide (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.167)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Carbon Dioxide (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.168)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Cardiac Rhythm (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.169)

SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Glasgow Coma Score Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.170)
